name: kagura
description: Utility methods for creating comparators, ie. function(left,right) : number.

scripts.test: npx nyc --reporter html --reporter text npx mocha --reporter spec
scripts.doc: npm run doc-create && npm run doc-coverage
scripts.doc-create: npx typedoc --mode file --name js-kagura --readme README.md --out docs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --excludeProtected --theme minimal main.ts
scripts.doc-coverage: npx nyc --reporter html --report-dir docs/coverage npx mocha --reporter spec
scripts.clean: rm -rf main.js main.d.ts docs/* coverage/* dist.js dist.min.js babel.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run babel && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run doc

author: Andre Wachsmuth
